action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hey there,

Could we please make some changes to the Timbertop Slat product page (https://acoufelt.com/au/product/slat) on the Au and GLOBAL site


Can we please add the following to the downloads section:


Warranty
Care guide


Change 'Composition' to: 'Polyester + MDF + Non PVC finish'




Change from 'Colorways' to 'Wood finish'




Thanks so much!



Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager




T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790
Level 8, 26 Flinders Street, Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com

On 30 Jun 2021, at 1:03 pm, Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com> wrote:

Hey Heath,

Priority web tasks for both the AU and ROW sites are:

  1. Upload Olga's media release (sent in email attached) to NEWS page
  2. Upload new carpet tile spec sheets and update specification tables on all carpet product pages (email attached with notes on what to change on spec tables on each product page)
  1. Please use carpet specs contained in this link: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/zqhrflk9u7xqwtc/AAAtX70FEK-UXgv1VqnZL9LAa?dl=0
  1. Upload TWO new Timbertop SLAT spec sheets and update specification tables on Timbertop Slat product page
  1. 2 x Timbertop slat specs to add also in this link: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/zqhrflk9u7xqwtc/AAAtX70FEK-UXgv1VqnZL9LAa?dl=0
  2. Please name the 2 spec sheets 'Specification sheet - FilaSorb12' and 'Specification sheet - FilaSorb30'
  3. Please note the FOUR thicknesses to add, and the correlating fire testing data to include on the product page, as well as the updated 'composition', and 'material' fields.
  1. Please update our ADELAIDE office address on the contact-us page to: Level 8, 26 Flinders Street, Adelaide SA 5000.

Hope all makes sense - let me know if you need any extra detail on any of these.

Once these are complete I'll send the remaining tasks across 😊

Thanks heaps!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

Subject: Re: Content freeze update and WP logins


[EXTERNAL] This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.

Hi Lucy,

We do have more access as of about 30mins ago. They are still refining the solution however.

The US marketing team would have little visibility as to our reduced access/issues we have been having. They have only been tasked with getting the US site operational and only know what the US agency would have been telling them.

We will be able to recommence working on the tasks now. The downloads are all available again already no as well. We may still come across some limitations, but for the most part we can operate as normal.

Are there any priority tasks you would like us to address?

Thanks,


Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au



On 30 Jun 2021, at 11:40 am, Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com> wrote:

Hey Heath,

Just had a catchup with the US marketing team this morning who have said that all of the US web development work has been complete, and that the content freeze shouldn't still be in place.

Are you able to follow up with the US guys on the progress of this, as it's now been over a week since we've been able to upload new content, and we're falling behind on some items.

I've also noticed my WP logins are no longer working, which might be related.

Thanks Heath.

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
